QuestData.Title: Farmer Fung's Vote III: Crazy For Cabbage
QuestData.Description: <Farmer Fung is beaming with a radiant smile.>$B$BThanks to you, I got my precious yaks back! Unfortunately, I noticed that their time out in the wild left them rather gaunt.$B$BThey must be starving, but I don't feed my prize yaks just any regular old grass.$B$BNo sir, they eat only the leafiest green cabbages you can find here in the Valley.$B$BMy stores are a bit low. If you bring me some cabbages for my yaks, I will reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant and harvest 3 Green Cabbages, then deliver 15 Green Cabbages to Farmer Fung.$B$BGreen Cabbage Seeds can be purchased from Merchant Greenfield at Halfhill Market. After tilling and tending your plant, you must wait until the next day to harvest ripe Green Cabbages.
